name: Mythological Melee
description:
This was made for the Ludum Dare 51 Game Jam!

Brawl it out 1v1 in Mythical Melee! Where every ten seconds, the wrath of the gods affects the stage you’re playing on! 4 Playable characters with 4 stages each, with both single-player and multi-player modes!

Lets meet the characters!

Hercules! A strong a slow fighter who knocks his opponents back with his huge fists!

Odysseus! He dropped his ship in exchange for a sick new skateboard! Dash around your opponents to win!

Medusa! The evil gorgon can strike from a distance with her snake hair! No need to get in close with those locks!

Pandora! She's a midweight fighter who knocks her opponents back with her mystical box!
